website_summaries.verdict: A tasty gummy supplement for healthy skin, hair, and nails.
pros: Comes in strawberry flavor, which most users enjoy
The formula is composed of a heavy dose of biotin along with vitamins C and E, which are all known for their positive effects on skin
cons: Some people may not enjoy the gummy texture or taste

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for over a year and I am very pleased. I started because I became ill and started losing my hair due to medication. It's the only product that helped.
customer_reviews.author: frckls

customer_reviews.title: Your fingernails will be amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Once these kick in, my nails go from flimsy paper to iron daggers of destruction. Just be careful, because if you're like me and are used to your nails being nonexistent, once they grow into elegant talons, you might nearly claw your own eyes out at a mere scratch. I suggest these to everyone in the hopes that one day we can have a fingernail duel.
customer_reviews.author: Richelle

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I got my hair cut too short and regretted it. I decided to cut my own bangs to try to spice it up...bad idea. I hated the way I looked and missed my long hair. I needed to find a way to grow my hair back fast. About one month later, I have 2.5 inches of growth and I have had to cut my nails every week. They usually break off constantly since I spend a majority of the day typing. I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST OUT THERE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that has worked for my hair, skin and nails! I have had a long history of medical issues that included chemotherapy and radiation directly to my head from brain cancer and multiple surgeries. My skin was a mess from heavy doses of steroids post surgeries. I tried the most expensive brands with no luck whatsoever. This is my go to product so please please please please don't ever stop making this or carrying it!!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Snack

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and my nails are growing strong and fast!
customer_reviews.text: I take these along with prenatal gummy vitamins just to get extra vitamins that aren't included in these. These taste so darn good that I have to keep telling myself that they are not candy. Most importantly, they give you the extra boost for your hair skin and nails as they claim. My nails grew this long (see pic) in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Grayce Music

customer_reviews.title: I love these gummies they are the only vitamin that I ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think to check the image before I bought and just based my purchase off of the title. I love these gummies they are the only vitamin that I can swallow that noticeably helps my nails. So I was excited when I saw “extra strength” and immediately bought it. There is nothing extra strength about these they have the America’s amount of biotin per serving as the regular this container just holds twice the amount of gummies the other containers have. If u are thinking about trying these gummies out I definitely recommend but if u are like me and thinking they are slightly different than the original then don’t bother
customer_reviews.author: Kteddy

customer_reviews.title: More hair loss!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these vitamins because i was looking for biotin for hair and nails. within a week of taking 2 gummies daily, i noticed my nails were super strong, really healthy and they grew fast. BUT within a couple weeks I started loosing so much hair! at first I thought it was something else like stress - but every time i took a shower i would loose giant hair balls (no exaggeration). I stopped taking them and within a couple weeks my hair stopped falling and it started growing again but my nails went back to breaking and whatnot.
customer_reviews.author: Jesenia Avila

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good gummy vitamins. I got these when it was hot here in Florida and never had any problems with the gummies. The flavor is AMAZING! My nails are stronger and I do believe these vitamins have been helping my hair grow. But, not real difference in my skin. I like these hair vitamins because there isn't an overload of biotin unlike so many out there that have WAY too much biotin. I thumbs up Nature's Bounty Hair, Skin, and Nails gummy vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: MEB7S63

customer_reviews.title: My nails have grown very strong with the use of ...
customer_reviews.text: My nails have grown very strong with the use of this. Unfortunately I havnt seen much difference in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kaity

customer_reviews.title: Definitely made my hair and nails stronger
customer_reviews.text: Definitely made my hair and nails stronger... I always seem to have some random acne pop up and these didn't seem to change that. About a month after I ran out of these (and hadn't gotten around to reordering them yet) I noticed my nails peeling at the ends again and that I was shedding more hair in my brush again so I immediately reordered them!
customer_reviews.author: jewel

customer_reviews.title: I didnt use em
customer_reviews.text: but got em for my niece. And boy what a mistake that was. One niece told the other and now am buying them for all the nieces. I guess they are really good or my nieces taking advantage of their uncle. Gave em 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bassem Hijazi

customer_reviews.title: Love! Gluten/wheat free, lactose/dairy free
customer_reviews.text: They taste amazing and help my hair and nails grow longer. My nails peel less when I take these. I never see a difference in my skin but I do love these gummy vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only vitamin that actually works for me. Once I started taking Nature's Bounty Hair skin and nails, my hair grew longer and thicker. My nails are longer and stronger than ever! I recommend this product over anything else on the market. Even better than those blue sugar bears! Thank for for continuing to make me feel beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it....You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT. I'VE ALWAYS HAD TO PUT ON FAKE NAILS. SINCE I'M USING THIS PRODUCT I AM SO PROUD OF MY NAILS. EVERYTIME I SEE MY SON I SAY AREN'T MOMMAS NAILS PRETTY? HE'S 33...I THINK HE'S TIRED OF ME ASKING...LOL
customer_reviews.author: LauraS

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate information on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I selected the "230 count (pack of 5)" for $19.99, and the page clearly showed 5 bottles of these vitamin gummies. However, I only received one bottle. Turns out the information is wrong. That option's price was supposed to be $262.38.
customer_reviews.author: LU

customer_reviews.title: I’m transitioning from relaxed to natural and my hair is ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m transitioning from relaxed to natural and my hair is growing out a lot with these vitamins . I can literally see my new growth busting out my braids lol . However , my only con is it made my skin break out a little despite all of the water I drink .
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Delivery & Flavor!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Delivery came earlier than I expected and the taste was AWESOME. It was full of flavor and taste just like a fruit snack. The flavor alone will keep me coming back for more plus the added benefits of the vitamins. I will purchase and may do an update on my hair,nails, and skin.
customer_reviews.author: Janeane

customer_reviews.title: Tad sweet but it works!
customer_reviews.text: It's a tad sweet but I noticed that my hair became fuller once I started taking these pills. I tried another brand but didn't have any affect on me so I switched back to this one. Just wish it wasn't so sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ..These work extremely well for me.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve taken these off and on for 4 years (sometimes I forget to take them). However, when I begin taking them routinely, it only takes about 4-5 days for me to notice my hair and nails (especially) getting longer! Ironically I prefer short hair on myself, therefore, I take them specifically for my nails. These work extremely well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: For my wife. She has noticed a definite improvement in the strength of her hair and nails after dealing with broken nails and hair shrinkage. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste and they are easy to chew. I am taking them for my nails but no luck, but the biotin and other vitamins are still good for you. I heard it has helped people with there nails though

customer_reviews.title: Great product. worth every penny.

customer_reviews.text: If you buy these and take them as shown on label, watch out for thickening skin on fingers and toes. I lost much of my feel in my fingertips due to thickening skin. Watch out for nails growing out flat without their normal curve. I took these for about 1.5 months then threw them out. No hair issues, but my nails and skin thickness have returned to almost normal after about 1 month away from this supplement. Not good!

customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Helped stop postpartum hair loss
customer_reviews.text: I had some pretty bad postpartum hair loss for a few months and I heard about these vitamins and figured it was worth a shot. Within about a month, my hair stopped falling out and I'm even seeing some growth coming back in. I haven't noticed much difference in my skin or nails, but stopping my hair loss was enough to convince me this is worth it. Also, they taste pretty good and don't upset my stomach at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn F.

product_meta.title: Nature's Bounty Extra Strength Hair Skin Nails
product_meta.description: Nature's Bounty optimal solutions hair, skin and nails gummies provides you with the vital nutrients your body needs to support your natural beauty from within. Vitamin E and vitamin C are antioxidants. Vitamin E contributes to skin health, and vitamin C is involved in collagen production and formation, which forms the basis for vibrant skin. Biotin helps to maintain healthy hair.
